【考法 1】 adj. 凸起的： having a surface or boundary that curves or bulges outward, as the exterior of a sphere
【例】 A convex function has the property that a line joining any two points on its graph lies on or above the graph.
【近】 bulging
【反】 dent, concave 凹陷的
【记】 vex是达到vertex顶点时的路径，从凸面走到顶点；curv + ex 向外弯的curv
【另】 apex顶点，axis轴，climax顶点
